price: On that Day the people of Paradise will have the best abode and the finest resting place.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
